privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: This privacy policy outlines how we collect and use information on our platform.

section1.title: Collection and Use of Information
section1.description: When you register on our site, you are asked to provide personal information as well as billing information when placing an order. This information is primarily used to facilitate your purchases, allowing you to complete orders quickly without having to re-enter the same information multiple times.

section2.title: Participation in Surveys and Contests
section2.description: We ask visitors to our site, who participate in surveys or contests organized by our platform, to provide certain information. Participation in these activities is entirely voluntary, and you are free to provide this information or not. The requested information includes your contact details, which are only used to contact the winners of the contests.

section3.title: Log Files and Analytics
section3.description: Like many websites, we use log files to collect data such as IP addresses, browser type, internet service provider, pages visited/exit, platform type, as well as date/time stamps and click counts. This information is collected for analysis, management, monitoring, and diagnosing overall site usage.

section4.title: Service-Related Announcements
section4.description: We may occasionally send service-related announcements to our users. For example, if our site is temporarily unavailable due to maintenance, we may notify users by email. These non-promotional messages generally cannot be opted out of.

section5.title: Legal Disclosure of Information
section5.description: While our priority is to protect the confidentiality of the information you provide, we may be required by law to disclose the information you have voluntarily provided when placing an order. We may also share information about a third party who poses a risk to our interests or whose activities could harm others.

section6.title: Sharing with Service Providers
section6.description: As part of our operations, we may share your personal information with service providers to whom we outsource certain tasks. These companies are not authorized to share, store, or use your personal information for any other purpose than what they are contracted for.

section7.title: Sharing with Group Companies
section7.description: We may share some of your personal information with companies in our group. Our sister companies that have access to your information will treat it with the same level of confidentiality that they apply to their own customers' information.

section8.title: Links to Other Sites
section8.description: Please note that our site may contain links to other websites. These sites may collect personal information about you. These legal terms do not cover the information collection practices or policies of those sites.

section9.title: Security Measures
section9.description: We implement several security measures to safeguard the personal information you provide. Although no method of transmission over the internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure, we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your personal data.

section10.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
section10.description: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. Any changes will be communicated through the update of this document. We encourage you to review it regularly.

contact.title: Contact Us

about.title: About Us

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.description: We started with a vision to create high-quality, innovative products that bring people together. Our journey has been one of passion, dedication, and growth.

ourMission.title: Our Mission
ourMission.description: Our mission is to provide exceptional products that enhance your life and bring joy to every occasion. We strive for excellence and innovation in everything we do.

ourValues.title: Our Values
ourValues.description: Integrity, customer focus, and continuous improvement are the core values that guide us. We are committed to upholding these values in all our endeavors.
